mind
Class Relation

java.lang.Object
  mind.Relation
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExpectationPattern, LazyRelation
public class Relation
extends java.lang.Object

Componente fundamental de la mente del lector.

Author:
Sergio Gutiérrez Mota e Israel Cabañas Ruiz
